function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High similarity between SARS-CoV-2 and bat coronaviruses","Impact":"Increased likelihood of zoonotic transmission to humans","Mitigation":"Regulate wildlife trade and monitor and control wildlife markets","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing and monitoring of wildlife populations","People":"General public, wildlife market workers, and individuals involved in wildlife trade","Owner":"Government regulatory agencies and public health organizations"},{"Description":"High mortality rates of known coronaviruses (MERS-CoV, SARS-CoV)","Impact":"Severe health outcomes and high fatality rates","Mitigation":"Enhanced public health surveillance, early detection, and rapid response to outbreaks","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, contact tracing, and vaccine development","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in affected regions","Owner":"Public health authorities, medical research institutions, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic and flu-like symptoms of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and containing the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Widespread testing, symptom monitoring, and public health education","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests, symptom tracking apps, and telemedicine","People":"General public and individuals at high risk (e.g., elderly, immunocompromised)","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare providers, and technology companies"}]}
